/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. Dominating the center of the frame is a large white concrete overpass, its curved roof reaching towards the clear blue sky. The overpass is adorned with a red and white striped awning, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochromatic structure. 

On either side of the overpass, the street is alive with activity. Cars and buses navigate their way along the road, while pedestrians traverse the sidewalk, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the overpass.
